name: Grafana
description: Search dashboards, query Prometheus and Loki datasources, manage alerts, and investigate incidents through the official Grafana MCP server.

inputs.label: Grafana URL
inputs.description: URL of your Grafana instance. Include the protocol (http:// or https://).

inputs.label: Grafana Service Account Token
inputs.description: Service account token with appropriate permissions. Create a service account with the Editor role for full read/write access.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to your Grafana instance
2. Navigate to Administration > Service accounts
3. Click 'Add service account'
4. Assign the 'Editor' role
5. Click 'Add service account token'
6. Copy the generated token (starts with glsa_)

inputs.label: Grafana Username
inputs.description: Username for basic authentication. Use as an alternative to service account token authentication.

inputs.label: Grafana Password
inputs.description: Password for basic authentication. Used together with GRAFANA_USERNAME.

inputs.label: Grafana Organization ID
inputs.description: Organization ID for multi-org Grafana setups. Leave empty for single-org instances.

auth.instructions: Create a service account token in your Grafana instance under Administration > Service accounts
